      • selectInEditor

        public void selectInEditor(VirtualFile file,
                           int startOffset,
                           int endOffset,
                           boolean toSelectLine,
                           boolean toUseNormalSelection)
        Description copied from class: SelectInEditorManager
        Do selection in Editor. This selection is removed automatically, then caret position is changed, focus is gained to Editor, or this method is called again.
        Specified by:
        selectInEditor in class SelectInEditorManager

      • caretPositionChanged

        public void caretPositionChanged(CaretEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: CaretListener
        Called when the caret position has changed.

        Only explicit caret movements (caused by 'move' methods in Caret and CaretModel) are reported, 'induced' changes of caret offset due to document modifications are not reported.

        Specified by:
        caretPositionChanged in interface CaretListener
        Parameters:
        e - the event containing information about the caret movement.
